metadata.title: RHBA-2020:1310: Red Hat Virtualization Host (redhat-virtualization-host) 4.3.9 async (Moderate)
metadata.description:
The redhat-virtualization-host packages provide the Red Hat Virtualization Host. These packages include redhat-release-virtualization-host. Red Hat Virtualization Hosts (RHVH) are installed using a special build of Red Hat Enterprise Linux with only the packages required to host virtual machines. RHVH features a Cockpit user interface for monitoring the host's resources and performing administrative tasks.

Includes fixes for CVE-2018-14404.

Changes to the redhat-virtualization-host component:

* The Red Hat Virtualization Host could not be deployed successfully on systems with an AMD Epyc CPU. 
In this release, Red Hat Virtualization Host deployment is successful. (BZ#1796967)

bugzilla.text: CVE-2018-14404 libxml2: NULL pointer dereference in xmlXPathCompOpEval() function in xpath.c

platform: Red Hat Virtualization 4 for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7

criterions.comment: cockpit-ovirt-dashboard is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
redhat-release-virtualization-host is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
redhat-virtualization-host-image-update-placeholder is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
redhat-virtualization-host-image-update is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
